subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Islanders do not have a lot of playoff experience, but they held their own and earned a 4-1 victory in the opening game of their best-of-seven series against the Capitals.
snippet: The Islanders do not have a lot of playoff experience, but they held their own and earned a 4-1 victory in the opening game of their best-of-seven series against the Capitals.
